value: Snap-and-Hold: Cinematic momentum followed by a 2-second stabilization lock to prevent mascot limb drifting.
Dynamic Specular Bloom: Light must refract through diamond facets creating sharp prismatic flares. Environment utilizes 'Houston Purple' hour lighting.
High-shutter speed (90-degree look) to ensure the chrome 84s/elbows stay sharp while spinning.
High-saturation Candy Red, Deep Violet, and Volumetric Gold.
No fluid or melting foam fingers
